# R Ecology

## Install Packages

Run the (Setup.Rmd)[Setup.Rmd] RStudio notebook once.

## Load

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(ratdat)
```

## Lessons Snippits

```{r}
install.packages("ggplot2")
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(ratdat)
?complete_old
```

```{r}
# View(complete_old)
```

```{r}
str(complete_old)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = complete_old)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = complete_old, mapping = aes(x = weight, y = hindfoot_length))

```

```{r}
ggplot(data = complete_old, mapping = aes(x = weight, y = hindfoot_length)) +
  geom_point()
```
